original_text: So this is what the Lord Almighty says: ‘My people who live in Zion, do not be afraid of the Assyrian army. They will hurt you, like someone who hits you with a heavy stick. They will be cruel to you like the people in Egypt were long ago.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 만군의 여호와께서 이르시되 시온에 거주하는 내 백성들아 앗수르가 애굽이 한 것처럼 막대기로 너를 때리며 몽둥이를 들어 너를 칠지라도 그를 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: So this is what the Lord Almighty says
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 이것이 전능하신 주께서 말씀하시는 바입니다

sentences.original_text: My people who live in Zion
do not be afraid of the Assyrian army
like someone who hits you with a heavy stick
They will be cruel to you
like the people in Egypt were long ago
